statements: SELECT * FROM route_tracking;
SELECT route_id, departure_time FROM route_tracking ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM route_tracking WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT route_id, traffic_intensity FROM route_tracking WHERE traffic_intensity = 3;
SELECT AVG(distance) AS avg_distance FROM route_tracking;
SELECT * FROM route_tracking WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY departure_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT route_id, distance, traffic_intensity FROM route_tracking WHERE traffic_intensity = 3 ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(distance), MAX(traffic_intensity) FROM route_tracking;
SELECT * FROM route_tracking WHERE departure_time > '2021-09-20 08:00:00' AND arrival_time < '2021-09-20 12:00:00';
SELECT route_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM route_tracking WHERE distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY route_id ASC, departure_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE route_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, traffic_density FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM RouteEfficiency INNER JOIN TrafficPatterns ON RouteEfficiency.route_id = TrafficPatterns.route_id WHERE TrafficPatterns.average_speed > 60;
SELECT route_id, SUM(traffic_density) AS total_traffic FROM TrafficPatterns GROUP BY route_id HAVING total_traffic > 500;
SELECT * FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY efficiency_score DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE efficiency_score > 0.8;
SELECT route_name, distance, efficiency_score FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE efficiency_score IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE traffic_density < 0.5 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, congestion_rate FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_rate > 0.7 AND average_speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT * FROM RouteEfficiency;
SELECT route_name, avg_speed FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT start_location, end_location, route_type FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, pattern_name FROM TransportationRoutes JOIN TrafficPatterns ON TransportationRoutes.pattern_id = TrafficPatterns.pattern_id;
SELECT pattern_name, congestion_rate FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_rate < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM RouteEfficiency;
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM RouteEfficiency WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT pattern_name, congestion_rate FROM TrafficPatterns WHERE congestion_rate < 0.5;
SELECT start_location, end_location, route_type FROM TransportationRoutes WHERE route_type = 'Highway';
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance, avg_speed FROM RouteEfficiency JOIN TransportationRoutes ON RouteEfficiency.route_id = TransportationRoutes.route_id ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance_km FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT schedule_id, departure_time FROM route_schedule ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 100;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, max_load_kg FROM vehicles ORDER BY max_load_kg DESC;
SELECT pattern_id, congestion_level, average_speed_kmph, timestamp FROM traffic_patterns WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, traffic_conditions FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy';
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, driver_id FROM vehicles WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance > 50 ORDER BY start_location ASC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE traffic_conditions = 'Heavy Traffic'
SELECT route_id, end_location, distance, traffic_conditions FROM routes WHERE distance < 100 AND traffic_conditions = 'Light Traffic'
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM vehicles WHERE capacity >= 20 ORDER BY vehicle_type DESC
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Bus')
